title: Sent sanitation stuffs near Sankhu, Kathmandu
content: Sent $350.00 to Nepal to Mr. Pratik Shrestha by Sahas Shrestha whose team helped the victims  mostly providing sanitation stuffs near Sankhu, Kathmandu. donated: tents, rice, cooking oil, salt, sugar, dal, bitten rice, tea packets, torch light, noodles...etc ( from us medicines, jeevan jal3-4 pac each, soaps, sanitation, woman sanitations, water purification, masks, copy and chocolate)
